seed_context.known: Did you see what she was trying to create?
seed_context.target: ¿Viste lo que ella estaba intentando crear?

practice_phrases.known: Did you see?
Did you see her?
Did you see the film?
Did you see several horses on the road?
Did you see what he wanted to grow?

seed_context.known: Did you see what she was trying to create?
seed_context.target: ¿Viste lo que ella estaba intentando crear?

practice_phrases.known: Did you see what I wanted?
Did you see what she said?
Did you see what he heard?
Did you see what I wanted to learn?
Did you see what he wanted to grow on Wednesday?
practice_phrases.target: ¿Viste lo que él quería cultivar el miércoles?

seed_context.known: Did you see what she was trying to create?
seed_context.target: ¿Viste lo que ella estaba intentando crear?

practice_phrases.known: What she was trying...

I heard what she was trying to say.
practice_phrases.target: Escuché lo que ella estaba intentando decir.

practice_phrases.known: I didn't hear what she was trying to learn.
practice_phrases.target: No escuché lo que ella estaba intentando aprender.

practice_phrases.known: Did you see what she was trying to grow?

practice_phrases.known: I was trying to create something.

practice_phrases.target: Ella estaba intentando crear una película.

practice_phrases.known: He was trying to create something on Wednesday.
practice_phrases.target: Él estaba intentando crear algo el miércoles.

practice_phrases.known: I heard that she was trying to create a film.
practice_phrases.target: Escuché que ella estaba intentando crear una película.
